entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016
